articles.author: Omar Sohail
articles.title: iPhone 17e May Not Suffer The Same Price Hike Fate As Apple’s Competitors As Company Is Rumored To Have Achieved A Supply Chain Efficiency Boost - Wccftech
articles.description: Apple is rumored to have achieved a supply chain boost efficiency for the iPhone 17e, resulting in the device avoiding a potential price hike
articles.content: The biggest perpetrators of increasing smartphone prices are NAND flash and DRAM, which were estimated to cost 70 percent and 100 percent higher, respectively. For the top-tier storage iPhone 18 mode… [+2486 chars]
